about_the_game:
Welcome to Dungeon of Love!
Ready to dive into dungeons filled with danger, excitement, and… your next romantic date? In this world, every battle can change your destiny because the monsters you capture won't just join your team—they might become your dream partner!

Explore Dungeons and Capture Hearts

Face wild creatures, but don't underestimate them—once captured, they reveal their true form: magical girls with personalities as unique as they are irresistible! The shy sorceress? The bold warrior? Choose wisely whom you charm, as each one has much more than meets the eye.

Build the Refuge of Your Dreams

When you're not fighting (or flirting), focus on upgrading your base. Train, sharpen your skills, and earn money to gear up for your adventures. Remember, even the best adventurer needs a cozy spot to relax and… socialize!

Discover Their Secrets (and Perhaps Their Hearts)

Every girl has her story, her preferences, and her special moments with you. Talk to them, get to know them better, go on romantic dates, and unlock unique rewards in your gallery as you grow closer to them in ways you never imagined.

Key Features:

  • Breathtaking Turn-Based Action: Strategic combat with a seductive twist.

  • A Charming Cast: From the sweet girl next door to the mysterious rebel, there's someone for every taste!

  • Management and Customization: Turn your refuge into a place worthy of a hero and their conquests.

  • Art That Captivates: Every character and dungeon is designed to delight your eyes and your heart.

In Dungeon of Love, the adventure doesn't end when you defeat the final boss… that's when the real fun begins! Explore, conquer, and discover who will become your next great romance. Are you ready to enter?

name: DUNGEON OF LOVE: Catch Monsters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU such as Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU such as NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Capture monsters, discover their human form, and fall in love with a unique cast of girls while exploring dangerous dungeons. Love has never been this adventurous!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese
